name: Critical 47
description: Critical 47 is hybrid in genetics and by name. A sweet, skunky cross between Critical Mass and AK-47 Critical 47 has a reputation for its pungent aroma and happy, relaxing effects. The rapid finishing time and flavors of mango, peach, and vanilla make Critical 47 a treat for growers and consumers alike. It is a great strain for cloning due to its small internodal distance and thick branches. However, its stong odor encourages the use of carbon filters when grown indoors.
descriptionPlain: Critical 47 is hybrid in genetics and by name. A sweet, skunky cross between Critical Mass and AK-47 Critical 47 has a reputation for its pungent aroma and happy, relaxing effects. The rapid finishing time and flavors of mango, peach, and vanilla make Critical 47 a treat for growers and consumers alike. It is a great strain for cloning due to its small internodal distance and thick branches. However, its stong odor encourages the use of carbon filters when grown indoors.

highlightedReviews.text: I bought an 1/8th of this five months ago, but this is one of those experiences you might never forget. It is like the first time you become medicated. I noticed I had a lot of anxiety and a lot of stress going to a party so I brought my cannabis and medicated before going in and had a good time, not one of the best but a great time. If you have stress anxiety, mood disorders or even a severe amount of pain and nerve damage I highly suggest this. It is a wondrous strain if you're looking for a powerful CBD strain, but still holding a lot of the THC to become medicated, but not to much.
its not a bad flavor but it is a bit like leafy home grown like the buzz as far as a down and relaxed but would rather it be cleaned yup a bit more,,it would be nicely suited at 10 a g if so.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Santa Maria, White Elephant, Critical Sensi Star, Critical 47, and Iced Widow
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Happy Halloween, Leafly friends! We've started adding your requests to the Leafly Explorer, so be sure to check out all of our newest additions. Here are five of our new favorites for you to read up on and try out this holiday weekend if they're available in your area. Enjoy!
   1. Santa Maria
Characteristics of Santa Maria:

75% sativa 
Cross between a Brazilian sativa, Mexican Haze, and Silver Pearl
Fruity, flowery aroma
Uplifting, energetic, and arousing effects

   2. White Elephant
Characteristics of White Elephant:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between White Widow and Purple Elephant
Breeder: Rare Dankness Seeds
Grape and berry aroma
Relaxing, energetic, and uplifting effects
May help with stress and depression

   3. Critical Sensi Star
Characteristics of Critical Sensi Star:

90% indica strain
Cross between Critical Mass and Sensi Star
Breeder: Delicious Seeds
Lemon, grapefruit, and skunky aroma 
Relaxing, happy effects
May help with insomnia, muscle spasms, or high stress levels.

   4. Critical 47
Characteristics of Critical 47:

Hybrid strain
Cross between Critical Mass and AK-47
Mango, peach, and vanilla aroma
Happy, relaxing effects

   5. Iced Widow
Characteristics of Iced Widow:

Mostly indica 
Cross between ICE and White Widow
Diesel aroma
Heavy, long-lasting effects
May help with chronic pain

growInfo.growNotes:
Carbon filters are a must for indoor grows
	Plant outdoor in soil to reach full genetic potential
	Quick flowering time
	Short vegetation time
	Great for cloning
